jobDescription: Job summary Join a small, highly skilled data science team using state of the art machine learning and data analysis to improve Wi-Fi networking. This position offers the unique opportunity to apply data science to a new area (wireless networking) which itself is deep and scientific. We are engaged in solving difficult problems in prediction, optimization, clustering, and performance.  The data itself is huge in scale, encompassing measurements from millions of users worldwide at time granularity of seconds. And, your work will improve the performance of cool consumer products that your friends are buying! ResponsibilitiesUtilize machine learning techniques to develop:Predictive models of network parameters such as load and interferenceNetworking anomaly detectionClient behavior classification
